trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute declaration.
A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> can be used to represent an expression that declares an attribute.
The attribute name and the arguments for the attribute are stored as properties of the object.
A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeArgument> can be used to represent each argument for the attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> class using the specified code type reference.
The `attributeType` parameter is used to set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration.AttributeType%2A> and <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration.Name%2A> properties.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that identifies the attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> class using the specified name.
The name of the attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> class using the specified code type reference and arguments.

The `attributeType` parameter is used to set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration.AttributeType%2A> and <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration.Name%2A> properties, and the `arguments` parameter is used to set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration.Arguments%2A> property for the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration>.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that identifies the attribute.
An array of type <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeArgument"></xref> that contains the arguments for the attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> class using the specified name and arguments.
The name of the attribute.
An array of type <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeArgument"></xref> that contains the arguments for the attribute.
Gets the arguments for the attribute.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeArgumentCollection"></xref> that contains the arguments for the attribute.
Gets the code type reference for the code attribute declaration.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the attribute being declared.
The name of the attribute.
